did.unittitle: "Speculum Vitae: essai de philosophie mystique" manuscripts
did.abstract: Collection comprises two versions (1916, 60 pgs.; 1917, 8 pgs.) of Bernard's manuscript entitled "Speculum vitae: essai de philosophie mystique," along with a cover dated 1920. Edits and annotations were made in both manuscripts, and other material or corrections on separate sheets of paper were laid in the 1916 copy, which also includes one illustration.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: Researchers must register and agree to copyright and privacy laws before using this collection.
